notes:
üì¢ Update: Stylish Action HUD v1.1.1

üêõ Bug Fixes (v1.1.1)
* **[dnd5e]** Fixed an issue where the 'Secret Attributes' feature was not functioning correctly.
* **[Theme]** Resolved a visual glitch in the Iron theme where the skew effect was double-applied to boxes surrounding number and var/max attributes.

‚ú® v1.1.0 Major Highlights (Previous)
* **UI & Layout:** Added Themed Collapse Button and Individual Card Sizing (Width/Height).
* **GM Tools:** Added 'Secret Attributes' for GM-only visibility and enhanced HUD hiding.
* **Resource Tracking 2.0:** New display styles (Numeric/Text) and Custom Icon support.
* **System Enhancements:** [PF2e] Feats separation, expanded tracking (Speed, AC, etc.). [D&D 5e] Spell DC display.

announcement.title: v1.1.1 Update: System Fixes & Iron Theme Patch
announcement.content: Fixed dnd5e Secret Attributes and Iron theme layout issues. (Includes v1.1.0 massive customization features!)
